title: Don't Tell The Bride groom forces bride to sleep in a tent on the night before wedding
text:

Don't Tell The Bride viewers couldn't believe their eyes last night when the groom forced his bride to sleep in a tent on the night before their wedding.

Meanwhile the groom stayed in a swanky hotel and said he hoped the experience would force his fiance to not be so high maintenance.

Josh, 26, has been branded the worst groom ever on the history of the show as his sobbing bride was forced to marry him without any of her beloved makeup and having only had a "rubbish" shower.

Rosie, 30, broke down in tears when she learned about Josh's plans for the day, while he was sipping on champagne with his friends in a luxury hotel.

(Image: Channel 4)

She had dreamed of getting married in a beautifully decorated converted barn, but Josh had other ideas.

He explained that he thought she looked fine without makeup, but that she got insecure without it.

That's why he decided to force her his future wife to go without the makeup she desperately wanted.

"She'll say she looks 'rough' but to me she'd still look beautiful", he said.

The bridal party were led to the tent in the festival wedding under the illusion it was their second hen do.

(Image: Channel 4)

(Image: Channel 4)

but Rosie then realised she was about to marry Josh in front of 7,000 people at Wickham Festival in Fareham.

At first she didn't believe it, and said: "I'm not starting my wedding day in a tent... he wouldn't do that. The showers are rubbish - what are we going to do?"

She furiously refused to even have the "festival make-up" Josh booked her in for.

Crying, she said: "It's my f*****g wedding day. I'm not alright.

(Image: Channel 4)

(Image: Channel 4)

"I don't want to see him. I'm not getting ready. I want to be excited and enjoy the morning and I'm still sat in a tent."

Her sobbing mum added: "My daughter shouldn't have to go through this on her wedding day - she's supposed to feel special.

"Nothing special about putting a bit of glitter on in the morning. Just reiterates the fact that Jake doesn't care about how she's feeling."

While one of Rosie's bridesmaids also said: "He's put her through hell."

(Image: Channel 4)

Viewers took to Twitter to fume about Josh's terrible decision.

One tweeted: "So he stays in a swanky hotel the night before their wedding whilst she has to stay in a tent and get married at a festival the next day. I'd absolutely murder him!"

"It's scary that the man she is about to be with forever hasn't considered her once or how she would feel", said another.

Another branded Josh "WORST GROOM EVER!!"

(Image: Channel 4)

(Image: Channel 4)

Another asked: "He does appear to be overly clueless and selfish, which begs the question - why is she marrying him the first place??!"

Rosie also revealed that when Josh proposed to her, she didn't even get a ring until eight months later.

But she did come around in the end and seemed to enjoy her wedding day.
description: Viewers were furious as groom Josh forced bride Rosie to sleep in a tent on the night before their wedding to try to make her less high maintenance
